originalText.text: My husband and I have been seeing Dr. Solomon for the past 5 years. He is an excellent physician. He is extremely knowledgeable, professional, and provides an extraordinary level of service and care. He is easy to talk to and considers our overall lifestyle in our annual medical check-ups. His staff are very efficient and pleasant to work with. We feel lucky to have Dr. Solomon as our internist!

His staff are very efficient and pleasant to work with. We feel lucky to have Dr. Solomon as our internist!

originalText.text: After many years of being a patient of Dr Solomon he still approaches each visit with same interests. He is concerned about the whole patient physically, and mentally. Which I find to be a rare quality. He has always been there for me . I am glad he is my doctor and I highly recommend him.

Which I find to be a rare quality. He has always been there for me . I am glad he is my doctor and I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr Solomon and his team. My 90+ parents have been his patients for many years.  Dr Solomon has always gone above and beyond in his caring for my parents. He is thorough, knowledgeable, and dedicated in every way. A consummate  professional and excellent communicator. If that were not enough, the office is run magnificently by Barbara. The amount of care in the practice is just awesome.

text.text: I highly recommend Dr Solomon and his team. My 90+ parents have been his patients for many years.  Dr Solomon has always gone above and beyond in his caring for my parents. He is thorough, knowledgeable, and dedicated in every way. A consummate  professional and excellent communicator. If that were not enough, the office is run magnificently by Barbara. The amount of care in the practice is just awesome.

originalText.text: Gregory Solomon and his staff are the ideal healthcare team. My mother was a patient of Dr. Solomon for many years and when she was in her mid-90s, I began going to her appointments with her. My mother died age 97, peacefully, at home as she had wished, with Dr Solomon's help. I was so impressed by the quality of the care my mother received, I asked Dr. Solomon to be my doctor. That was three years ago and he has seen me through several significant health emergencies with the kind of care and attention we all crave. In addition to great health care, the admin team is kind, efficient and fast.  I wish I could give more stars....

originalText.text: It is a pleasure to recommend Dr. Solomon, my primary care physician for over 20 years.  His health guidance has been unerring through a number of complex issues. His manner is as caring as if he were a member of my family and I truly enjoy going to see him. If you need a physician whom you can trust implicitly and whom you will grow to consider a friend, you owe it to yourself to contact Dr. Solomon. Dr. Solomon's staff is equally professional and lovely. They are an absolute pleasure to interact with!!
